Description:
SOLID RESIDENCE WITH SPACIOUS LIVING
Located within a short drive to all the facilities and services of central Bendigo, is this neatly presented cream brick residence on a low maintenance allotment.
The floorplan comprises three spacious bedrooms, kitchen/meals area, separate formal lounge plus a large rumpus/living area which adds further appeal and uniqueness to a home of this era.
The enclosed private yard offers a comfortable outdoor sitting area and off street undercover car parking is available.
The property's appeal is further enhanced by its close proximity to Lake Weeroona, local high school and recreational facilities.
Perfect for first home buyers, investors or retirees.
Bawa Singh : 0402 206 745

Description:
Spacious and Versatile - Just Move in and Enjoy!
Situated in the sought after Peppercorns Estate on a quiet street close to schools, Lake Weeroona, Bendigo hospital and only minutes from the CBD is this great home offering the lot to a growing family. From the light filled entry, the main bedroom on the left has an en suite with a large shower and walk in robe, while the other three bedrooms have built in mirrored robes all with ducted heating and cooling to keep you comfortable all year round. The kitchen is equipped with quality stainless steel appliances with plenty of bench space, cupboards, draws and a large caesar stone island bench. The free flowing open - plan design with 2570mm high ceilings offers a feeling of spacious and stylish living in comfort. The sliding door leads out to a huge 64 square metre private outdoor area that's great for entertaining and al fresco dining, with an alternative paved and shaded retreat at the rear of the house. Another great feature is the integrated cat 6e cable throughout for high speed internet and the home theatre complete with 3.8m wide screen and 1080p HD Projector and surround sound. The low maintenance gardens are auto reticulated from the 9000 litre rainwater tank catching off the 6m x 9m shed roof. The home is well placed on a 705m2 block with ample parking and driveway access to the 6m x 9m shed at the rear of the property, just move in and enjoy!
Insights: 7 Emerald Avenue, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Don't hesitate! Quality 4 Bedroom + Study Home
Situated in ever-popular Peppercorns Estate you will find this 4 bedroom + study home with all the upgrades you would expect of a quality property.
From the moment you walk in you are greeted with merbau timber floors, square set corners and high ceilings. All bedrooms have built-in robes with a large walk-in robe to the master, as well as an ensuite with double basin and oversize shower with double shower heads.
The kitchen continues with the upgrades, including stainless steel 900mm cooking appliances, splash back and large walk-in pantry.
A large living/dining area is adjacent to the kitchen, and can fit the entire family.
There is a fully insulated theatre room and a games room close to the back three bedrooms, the perfect space for children and teenagers.
Central heating and 3 x split systems ensure comfortable living throughout the year.
Outside finds a double garage with internal access to the home, and an alfresco area with BBQ connected to natural gas.
All this is on a good size allotment, facing Bendigo creek with walking paths to Lake Weeroona and Weeroona College.
Don't hesitate to inspect as this won't last.
Matt Landy : 0459 098 848

Description:
REDUCED TO SELL AT $200,000
Remember the old adage about books and covers? This is a classic example; the modest home has been totally transformed internally to create light, bright and very comfortable spaces with the latest in fittings and appliances. The fully renovated kitchen is now a white delight with stainless steel under-bench electric oven, ceramic hotplate, dishwasher, plenty of cabinetry and room for a dining table.
The open plan living area includes room for formal dining if desired. The main bedroom has a wall of mirror-fronted robes while the second bedroom overlooks the rear garden and the renewed bathroom includes glass shower and modern vanity. Fresh, clean paintwork, modern floor coverings, gas heating and air conditioner add to the appeal of this very affordable home.
Set on a block about 540 square metres, it includes a securely fenced and neat backyard, garden shed, a studio/workshop and a double carport on the side which could double as an outdoor living area. Walk to Weeroona College, public transport and the exciting new hospital precinct, this is a spotless property ideal for first home buyers or retirees.
Definitely don't decide till you've seen inside.
Helen Ashby : 0408 42 5566

Description:
Owners Relocating, Elegant Family Home
Located in the exclusive Peppercorns Estate, this beautiful and immaculate family home has it all. Only a few years old, the elevated property oozes quality and space with a perfectly designed floor plan that will suit every family.
The first living quarters features the executive master bedroom with walk-in robe and stunning ensuite, a great study and the large formal lounge; the perfect parent's retreat.
The spacious kitchen features exquisite silestone bench tops, plenty of cupboard and counter space including a large walk-in pantry, Blanco stainless steel appliances and 900mm oven. The kitchen opens out to the mammoth living/dining area that takes full advantage of the natural light with an abundance of windows and glass doors to outside. With a further three great sized bedrooms with built-in robes, main bathroom with spa, additional powder room and spacious laundry with ample storage.
Perfect for entertaining, outside includes a sensational undercover outdoor area equipped with block out blinds in a beautifully landscaped setting.
Additional features include a 3kw solar system, ducted heating and cooling, plush carpet, quality curtains and blinds, double lock-up garage and rear access with space for the boat or trailer.
Bill Williams : 0477 277 562

Description:
THE SURPRISE PACKAGE!
The appealing privacy of the high wall surrounding the front garden reveals little of the home beyond, but curiosity (in this case) will bring your imagination and excitement to life! Stepping over the property boundary opens your eyes to the possibilities of a new dream, one that provides the family with space, style, a large allotment and ultimate mancave / shed measuring a whopping (15m X 7m).
Deceiving from the street, this 981m2 block allows for options for both togetherness and solitude. With three large bedrooms, each containing built in robes. The main lounge area is positioned at the front of the home. Freshly painted inside & out, the condition allows you to simply walk in & enjoy. The family size bathroom is well presented, with bath, tiled flooring and quality fittings. The kitchen is open plan with your meals area, complete with access to the large undercover alfresco area, to overlook the rear yard, perfect for entertaining in all seasons!
This home is a practical choice for families seeking that next step up in terms of size of block & shedding already in the package.
Promising comfort with extras such as ducted gas heating, ducted evaporative cooling, ceiling fans in bedrooms, tiled floors, modern updates to bathrooms and kitchen, abundant storage, outdoor shed & ample yard space for kids to play. It also offers a prime location within easy reach of all local amenities. Well deserving of your undivided attention ... proving in this price bracket, you actually CAN have it all!
Andrew Pearce : 0419 544
251

Description:
First Home Opportunity or Ideal Investment
Tucked away off the main road yet only minutes from the CBD and convenient to all amenities,
this three-bedroom brick-veneer home is an excellent buy.
Primary and secondary schools, a post office, chemist and other shops are all close by and there's a bus route on Napier Street.
It would suit a range of buyers from a professional couple, to downsizers, investors and first home buyers.
Double gates on the driveway open to a single carport, while further in, there's a large shed with a concrete floor and power.
From the verandah, a front door opens to a good-size lounge room which has a wall-mounted air-conditioner. Through a wide opening is a kitchen and dining area with a suede-finish feature wall. The kitchen has an upright gas stove, and plenty of storage space above and below the benchtops.
A hallway extends from the kitchen to the three bedrooms. All have built-in wardrobes and ceiling fans while one has a wall-mounted air-conditioner. Ducted heating is throughout the home as well.
Also along the hallway are two-door linen storage, a four-piece bathroom and a laundry that opens to an outside ramp, under a second verandah, leading to the back garden. A garden shed with a concrete floor is another addition in the low-maintenance back garden where a number of fruit trees are happily growing, including apple, peach and apricot.
This is a great opportunity to buy a well-priced home and make it your own.

Description:
ONE OWNER BRICK VENEER HOME - GREAT VALUE!
With Separate gate access to the yard, this 19 year old, one owner home would most suit a couple either starting out or downsizing. The design boasts 3 bedrooms of which the master is quite roomy with a nice walk in robe and direct access to the 2 way bathroom. The other 2 bedrooms both have built in robes. The lounge room is a nice size and offers a gas heater, as well as a split system and with Summer almost upon us you will be pleased to know there is evaporative cooling throughout. The kitchen-meals has a sliding door outside to the sheltered patio/carport area. There is a roller door on the carport which ensures a secure yard for children and pets. The kitchen has a double pantry, handy breakfast bar and wall oven and hot plates. New brand new gas hot water service. Sited on just over 700 square metres, just off Heinz Street.

Description:
Surprises & Options Galore
Set on a 1280m2allotment, this 4 bedroom home offers a partly self-contained flat located downstairs with a large double bedroom with BIRs, a 3-piece bathroom, a lounge/dining area with a gas heater & great storage. Upstairs, there's a large lounge room with a gas log fire. Sliding doors open to a wonderful open-plan kitchen & dining area with a reverse-cycle split-system. Ample storage combines with an upright stove, a dishwasher & laminated benchtops. Ceiling fans throughout also add to the comfort. There are 3 bedrooms & a family bathroom. The main has a walk-through wardrobe to a 3-piece en suite while the 2 remaining bedrooms, have built-in wardrobes. As well as a double garage at the front with internal access, there's a 10 x 8-metre shed/workshop with vehicle accommodation, concrete floor, power & lights. There is a second double-gated driveway with a carport & convenient direct access to the self-contained accommodation.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - "We Get Results"

Description:
TIMELESS ELEGANCE
A heart warming home full of space and relaxed beauty. The captivating Tudor Style three bedroom
clinker brick home is proudly poised on an elevated
allotment opposite Weeroona College in White Hills. Wide, formal entrance/hall leads to lounge with double glass doors, feature brick fire place, gas space heater, reverse cycle split system and additional glass doors which open to a small balcony. Large bedrooms all with built in robes. Central family bathroom with lovely original tiling. Renovated
kitchen /meals comprises 5 burner gas hotplates, electric stove, fantastic
4 door pantry, granite benches and showcases polished floor boards. Long rear alcove area ideal for an extra living or study which provides a reverse cycle split system.
Step outside to a fantastic spacious entertaining area with polished concrete, pot belly and can be enclosed by plastic blinds. A very private deep garden offers side access to dbl garage. Simply walk to school, Lake Weeroona. Transport close by into Bendigos CBD.
Di Long : 0417 343 380

Description:
Perks in Peppercorns
Located in the prestigious 'Peppercorns Estate', this immaculate build incorporates spacious family living with quality fixtures and fittings and luxurious extras!
Three great sized, robed bedrooms, master with walk-in robe and ensuite with double vanity, open study area, and mammoth home theatre with projector and screen.
A divine kitchen with ample cupboard and bench space, quality stainless steel appliances and a massive island bench with 60mm granite bench top and additional timber breakfast bar opens out to the large dining/family area. The sensational, paved alfresco space comes complete with swimspa and manicured surrounds. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double lock up garage with internal access and a huge workshop with built-in cupboards ideal for storage, office space or a gym are only a few of the additional features this impressive property has on offer.

Description:
ALL YOU COULD WANT - PLUS A BIT MORE
This 3 bedroom brick veneer home oozes class, and is a home the new owners will be proud to own. Set in a quiet court close to the Bendigo Racecourse, this superb home is in immaculate condition. Freshly painted throughout, it comprises a formal lounge with built-in TV and stereo system, open plan kitchen/meals/ living area, the kitchen with gas and electric cooking, new dishwasher, large pantry and breakfast bar. All 3 bedrooms of good size and built-in robes, 2 way bathroom off the main bedroom including tastic and separate shower recess. A large split-system air-conditioner, plus ceiling fans, ensures all round seasonal comfort. Outside, there is an attractive covered entertaining deck , perfect for just relaxing and kicking back, a paved area as well as a large grassed area. There is a 4 car carport, plus a separate single carport, workshop, rainwater tank and more! Situated in a new home area of White Hills, conveniently close to all amenities. All the hard work is done, you can move right in - so don't miss inspecting this property NOW. For a personal inspection, contact John Sutton on 0418 573 808.

Description:
One for the Family to Call Home
In possibly one of the quietest and well-presented courts in popular White Hills, you will find this fabulous family home, offering a multitude of space and a perfect floor plan that includes 4 bedrooms and a large versatile study with plenty of storage, plus 2 living areas.
The main bedroom has a walk-in robe and ensuite, while the other 3 bedrooms have built-in robes.
You will get a great feel from the moment you pull up out the front, to walking along the washed stone drive to the decked veranda, which leads you to the front entrance.
The great open-plan kitchen/meals/family room has an outlook to the undercover decked alfresco area, and the second living offers a great aspect of the established yards.
In the kitchen, there is a massive walk-in pantry, and the appliances are all of a high quality.
Also included is ducted heating, cooling and vacuuming throughout, plus convenient internal access from the oversized double garage.
Outside, the gardens are presented perfectly, with paths and established fruit trees and plants, plus a handy storage shed.
Walking tracks, Lake Weeroona and only a short drive to Bendigo Central, adds to the perfect location.
Nekti Tzouroutis : 0412 242 321

Description:
Don't Let This One Get Away!
On an spacious allotment, this well maintained brick veneer home has decorative architraves and cornices, quality window furnishings, and brand new carpet throughout.The open-plan layout of the living space includes a formal lounge room with gas heating, a bright meals area and functional kitchen with a fan-forced electric oven, gas cooktop and rangehood, and plenty of cupboard space. There are three bedrooms off the hallway, including two with BIRs, and a very neat three-piece bathroom. There is also ducted evaporative cooling. Outside you have a lovely paved area, a spacious backyard and a handy storage shed. A concrete-paved driveway and single carport means plenty of off-street parking. It's also close to shops, public transport and schools and yet is only 10 minutes from the heart of the CBD.

Description:
Victorian Fantasy
Only a short drive from the CBD, in the heart of White Hills, is this three-bedroom weatherboard Victorian home that oozes character and charm and lots of potential.
All it needs from a first home buyer, family or a renovator is some imagination and work to maximise its features and possibilities.
Lofty pine-lined ceilings edged by deep glossy-white cornices are still intact, likewise three graceful arches, ceiling roses, skirting boards, dado pine walls and a central brick fireplace, now resplendent with a gas log fire in the living room, with an archway either side.
The home has 3 bedrooms along a central hallway, and a large living room at the front of the house that could easily be converted to a fourth bedroom.
An inviting country-style kitchen has a gas upright stove set into the original fireplace, room for a dining setting, and timber benchtops and cupboards.
Theres a vestibule at the rear of the home with a three-piece bathroom at one end, featuring a delightful stained-glass window (theres a matching one above the front door) and a laundry and separate toilet at the other.
The back door opens to a good sized verandah and an open backyard ideal for small children and pets and with its north-facing aspect, its a good place to grow vegies or start a garden.
A double carport is on the driveway and behind this is a 6 x 5-metre shed with concrete floor and power, a single roller door and single-door access to the backyard.
The White Hills shops and schools are close by and theres a bus to the CBD also. What are you waiting for?
Call Brett Thompson today to book a private inspection before this beautiful home sells!

Address: Lot 46 Topaz Avenue WHITE HILLS VIC 3550
Description:
Build within 3kms of the CBD!
Here is an opportunity to secure a fully fenced 673m2(approx.) block ready for you to build your dream home.
The block is located in the ever popular Peppercorns Estate with access to walking paths and recycled water, with plans for a future playground all within 3 km of the CBD.
The Peppercorns Estate is a pleasant walk to Weeroona College and the beautiful Lake Weeroona.
This is the last lot available in this stage so don't hesitate. Call today.
Matt Landy : 0459 098 848

Description:
Period home in White Hills
This character weatherboard home strikes the perfect balance between classic exteriors and contemporary interiors. Featuring spacious domains and open plan living, it also offers an exceptional outdoor entertaining area. 3 bedrooms and two separate living areas and recent updates further enhance this beautifully maintained abode.
It also includes:
*Gas heating and airconditioning
*Built in robes, polished floor boards
*Updated appliances
*Walk to schools, buses or sporting facilities

Description:
3 Bedroom Cream Brick
Situated on a good size corner allotment this very solid well located home includes lounge, kitchen-dining, gas cook top and HWS. 3bedrooms, bathroom, laundry and single garage. The home is an ideal First home offering great potential for cosmetic improvement or excellent investment being currently let at $250pw, however vacant possession is available. Located in Cahill Street just past Weeroona College in a very popular residential area.
